title: Winston Punch
directions: Pour the amaretto and whiskey into a large chilled glass, or a glass of ice cubes. Top off with lemon-lime soda. Stir, and serve.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger amaretto (almond flavored liqueur)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle chilled lemon-lime soda per serving
